title: Garorock Festival
description: Eat is Family (brand: The Beast) served festival-goers at Garorock with a revisited Smash Burger.

title: Lollapalooza
description: Eat is Family served festival-goers at Lollapalooza as part of its major events portfolio.

title: The Adidas Arena
description: Eat is Family operates as street food concessionaire for the Adidas Arena for four consecutive years.

title: 24 Hours of Le Mans
description: The brand Saucette served visitors at the prestigious 24 Hours of Le Mans motorsport event.

title: Hellfest Open Air
description: Eat is Family provided catering services to over 180,000 festival-goers at Europe's biggest metal festival.

title: Paris 2024 Olympics
description: We proudly catered to athletes and spectators during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
